property.name: gitlab_port
property.description: Port on which gitlab will run.

property.name: unicorn_port
property.description: Port on which unicorn interface will run (internal to gitlab).

property.name: unicorn_interface
property.description: Interface on which unicorn will listen (internal to gitlab).

property.name: gitlab_url
property.description: Alias URL of this server, what your users will use to get to this git, if blank, use hostname

property.name: restrict_public_projects
property.description: Disables the public visibility level for projects.

property.name: gitlab_signin_enabled
property.description: Toggles the availability of the standard signin dialog. If ldap is enabled than this setting is ignored and only ldap is allowed.
